question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. motorcycle
B. man sitting on the bench
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The motorcycle is parked in the foreground on the street, while the man is seated at a picnic table further back on the sidewalk, making the motorcycle clearly closer to the camera.
